title: Planet Hopper
description: Use your ship to navigate and jump between different planets across the galaxy, but be careful not to drift off into the vastness of outer space!
instructions: Click or tap to jump between planets.

title: Pop Party - Suika Watermelon
description: Get ready for Pop Party, a fast-paced 2D physics puzzle game with a wild twist! Your goal? Merge them to create bigger, better versions before your jar overflows! Power-Up the Madness! Turn the tide of the game with six powerful abilities: Shake Level Up Level Down Claw Bomb Color Bomb Unlock Stunning Themes! Progress through the game and collect unique themes, each transforming the look of your balls: Can you master the chaos, merge your way to victory, and unlock every theme?
instructions: Use mouse or touch to interact with in game interface

title: Falling Blocks Puzzle
description: Falling Blocks Puzzle is a timeless puzzle game where players arrange falling geometric shapes, to form complete horizontal lines. As lines are completed, they disappear, and players earn points. The game ends when the stack of shapes reaches the top of the screen. It’s a test of strategy and quick thinking, beloved by gamers worldwide.
instructions: Keyboard: ⚈ Left arrow: Move left ⚈ Right arrow: Move right ⚈ Dow arrow: Move down ⚈ Up arrow or X: Rotate right ⚈ Z: Rotate left ⚈ Space : Drop ⚈ Left arrow: Move left Mouse or touch: ⚈ Left mouse click (or touch): Rotate ⚈ Left mouse drag (or touch drag): Move ⚈ Drop button: Drop

title: Farm Block
description: Farm Block is an engaging farm-themed puzzle game where players slide adorable animal blocks to free them from the farm. Test your strategic thinking and enjoy the charming countryside setting! With its mix of puzzle-solving and elimination mechanics, Farm Block offers a fun and rewarding challenge for all ages.
instructions: 1️⃣ Slide animal blocks in the right direction to create space. 2️⃣ Match & Eliminate blocks strategically to clear the path. 3️⃣ Solve Puzzles with increasing difficulty levels. 4️⃣ Escape the Farm! Complete levels and rescue all the animals.

title: Color Nuts & Bolts Puzzle
description: Color Nuts & Bolts Puzzle is a fun and engaging puzzle game that challenges your spatial imagination and color-matching skills! Match colorful screws to their corresponding nuts and watch as your puzzle-solving skills bring vibrant images to life. Perfect for players of all ages, this game offers hours of brain-teasing fun with a visually satisfying reward at the end of each challenge. Test your logic, precision, and creativity in this unique puzzle-solving adventure!
instructions: Objective: Match the colored screws to their corresponding nuts on the board. How to Play: 1) Drag and drop screws to the nuts of the same color. 2) Ensure the screws fit correctly without overlapping or blocking other screws. Challenge Mode: Solve a series of puzzles to reveal a complete picture! Win Condition: Complete the puzzle by successfully matching all screws to their nuts.

title: Huggy Mix Sprunki Music Box
description: Welcome to the wonderful world of Huggy Mix Sprunki Music Box. This music game is filled with energy and rhythm. Follow the beats, tap along to the music, and have fun with casual gameplay.You can choose three modes: health, ice, and bad man. You can make unique tunes that reflect your personality.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Merge Run Battle
description: Merge and defeat all enemies! Have you ever played best gameplay with merge and fighting? If you want to look for a top game in the simple running and merge game, adventure game Merge Run Battle is the best choice of simulator game for you. Run to collect your teammates of the same level into more powerful. The final level character has extremely destructive power. At the end of the race, you need to think quick and act fast, merge them all to get more power and win the battle.
instructions: Swipe horizontally to control.

title: Team Loyalty
description: Build your crowd and claim victory! In this addictive game, you begin with a single character, but things quickly escalate as you pass through numbered gates and grow your crowd. Dodge obstacles, expand your group, and outnumber your enemies to win. The largest and strongest crowd prevails — can you assemble the biggest one and emerge victorious?
instructions: Control the characters by swiping left and right with your mouse on Desktop. For mobile control, you can move the characters by swiping right and left with your finger.

title: Royal puzzle Burst
description: Tap blocks of the same color to make them burst and eliminate attacking blobs! Enjoy a straightforward and gratifying game with intuitive controls.
instructions: click on blocks of the same color

title: Money Chaser- City Parkour Game
description: Chasing/Running eldnlessly for collecting coins(Money). Try to avoid traps & *kick out all the enemy/competitors on your way. *You can kick out enemy infront of you with slide skill* After you have enough money, you can challenge the Boss fight. The amount of coins(Money Bullets) is the only weapon to defeat Boss, the more the better. Remember, no money no life...just keep running :)
instructions: For Keyboard : "Space" Key → Jump "A" Key → Slide or Shoot (In Boss Battle) For Touch Screen/Mobile : Tap Right Part of Screen → Jump Tap Left Part of Screen → Slide or Shoot (In Boss Battle)

title: 1945 Air Force Airplane
description: Welcome to the 1945 Air Force: Airplane! Begin intense shooting battles in the sky as you engage in nervous fighting action. Upgrade your plane, defeat enemies, and enter epic aerial battles.Every victory brings you closer to becoming the ultimate air force commander.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Dragon Hunter
description: Choose your character, roll the dice and go on a fun adventure. Click on monsters - help the hero survive and defeat the legendary dragons in the clicker RPG Dragon Hunter. Luck and a strong phone glass will determine the fate of the dragon hunter.
instructions: The goal of the game is to visit all locations, passing them by killing monsters on your way. Control - touch/click.

title: Smash The Bottle
description: The goal of the game is simple: break all the bottles on the screen according to the given requests in each stage. Your accuracy and timing are crucial, so pay close attention to the instructions and let the smashing begin!
instructions: Click on the bottles to destroy them.

title: Gravity Speed Run
description: Gravity Speed Run is a game where you run along walls instead of on the ground. You will climb vertical surfaces, avoiding obstacles and head-on collisions. As you advance, try to complete the challenging levels, this game will test how fast you react.
instructions: touch or mouse right to move up/down

title: Pixel Fun Color By Number
description: Pixel Fun - Color By Number is a fun coloring game that lets you bring pixel art to life. With casual number-based instructions, you’ll fill in each pixel square to reveal stunning artwork.Each image is divided into tiny pixels. Each is assigned a number that corresponds to a color. For example, click on the city scene to fill in color and light up the street.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Snake Classic
description: Snake Classic: A modern twist on the nostalgic snake game. Navigate your snake through six unique modes: Classic, Box, Tunnel, Mill, Condo, and Rail. Collect fruits and gems, customize your snake with skins, and enjoy multi-language support. Compete on personal leaderboards and play on both PC and mobile. Fun and engaging for all ages!
instructions: Objective: Control your snake to collect fruit and gems while avoiding collisions with walls and your own tail. PC Controls: Movement: Use the WASD keys or Arrow keys to control the direction of the snake. Mouse Control: Swipe with your mouse in the direction you want the snake to move. Mobile Controls: Swipe: Swipe up, down, left, or right on the screen to control the direction of the snake.

title: Mow It
description: Mow It Harvest is a colorful simulator in which you will have a farm and your own harvester at your disposal. You need to cut grass, sell colorful hay and move on to new levels. Cut grass like a real farmer and become a millionaire in this bright, exciting game!
instructions: For PCs: - Keyboard control via AWSD For Mobile Devices: - Control via joystick. Control with one finger

title: Farmer Rush: Idle Farm Game
description: The combination of merging crops, upgrading your farm, and the satisfaction of watching your fields bloom makes this game a perfect pick for players who love farming sims or idle games.
instructions: Get ready to immerse yourself in a vibrant world where you can plant, merge, and harvest your way through beautifully designed farm fields. Start with a small plot of land and a handful of seeds. Your mission is to cultivate your farm into a flourishing paradise filled with a rich variety of crops. As you progress, you’ll unlock new areas, discover rare seeds, and develop your farming strategies to optimize your yields. Begin your journey to becoming a farming master!

title: Delivery Chaos
description: Delivery Chaos is a fast-paced driving game where explosions turn every delivery into a challenge! Navigate through explosive mayhem, collecting waypoints to rack up coins and boost your score. Outmaneuver destruction, and unlock powerful new vehicles and exciting map areas. Can you survive the chaos and become the ultimate delivery driver?
instructions: Driving - WASD/Arrow keys / Right trigger, Left Trigger, Left stick Handbrake - Spacebar / Triangle Unlock cursor - V Return to menu - Tab / Circle

title: Labo Brick Train Game For Kids
description: This is an assembly train game for all ages. Do you like small train toys? Have you ever wanted to assemble a beloved train by yourself? You can't miss our game if you are interested in all this.First of all, you need to pick out your favorite train style. Then start assembling the train from the locomotive, followed by the body.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Happy Town
description: In Happy Town you have to lead your own city and make its inhabitants happy! Becoming the mayor of your happy city is very simple! Combine items, upgrade buildings, complete tasks for residents, communicate with them, expand and enjoy a vibrant style and soundtrack. Residents are waiting for you!
instructions: The goal of the game is to become a successful mayor, develop your city by improving buildings, completing tasks for residents, communicating with them and expanding the territory to make the city happy and prosperous. Control: left mouse button/touch.

title: Hidden Object: Clues and Mysteries
description: Hidden Object: Clues and Mysteries is a relaxing hidden object game set in cozy interiors. Solve mysteries with a detective, accompanied by soothing melodies.
instructions: In the game, you can freely move left and right across locations and zoom in to find hidden objects. The game is available on both PC and mobile devices, allowing you to play anytime, anywhere.

title: Steampunk Tower Builder
description: Build the tallest tower and touch the sky with the steampunk tower builder! Simply tap to release the blocks, making sure to release them at the right time to balance the tower. The tower will rise higher with each correctly placed block. If a block falls, you’ll have to start over. Use the funds you’ve accumulated to build as high as possible and climb the leaderboard!
instructions: Click when the crane holding the next floor is exactly above the top floor to build the structure evenly without tilting, otherwise it may collapse.

title: Fill One Line
description: Dive into the world of fascinating logic and test your mind in an exciting puzzle! Your task is to draw a line across the entire playing field, filling it completely, but keep in mind: there will be obstacles on the way that you need to bypass. The game offers many levels, from simple to incredibly difficult, allowing each player to choose a suitable challenge.
instructions: Start from the chosen starting point. Draw a line, connecting the cells of the field to fill them. Avoid obstacles and plan the route so that the line does not break. Complete the level by filling the entire field without gaps.

title: Robbie: Become a Beast
description: Transform into a wild animal and train to become the fastest and strongest in "Robbie: Become a Beast"! ?? Improve your endurance, compete against rivals, and prove you're the best runner. ????‍♂️ Get pets to help you train and increase your chances of winning. ?? Enhance your skills and become faster and stronger with each victory! ?? Are you ready to be the ultimate beast? Train, compete, and win in "Robbie: Become a Beast"! ??
instructions: On the computer: W A S D - to move R - to dash Space - to jump Left mouse button - to train On the phone: Use the joystick and buttons on the screen

title: Real Car Parking And Stunt
description: Welcome to Real Car Parking And Stunt, a challenging driving simulation game. Here you’ll control a car and put your parking and stunt skills to the test. Choose stunt mode or parking mode, each level challenges you to park your car accurately while performing exciting stunts.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Office Escape to Date
description: You have a date after work, but theres a catch: you need to get ready without your boss catching you! Complete your tasks, and prepare for your date before time runs out. But be careful, if the boss appears, quickly close the activity to avoid getting caught and return to work. How fast can you escape the office and be ready in time?
instructions: Mouse Only

title: Paws & Pals Diner
description: Welcome to Paws & Pals Diner! Step into the paws of a diner manager and embark on a delightful 2D adventure where every customer and staff member is an adorable animal! In this charming and whimsical world, you'll manage a bustling diner filled with furry friends, unlock delicious foods, and attract a variety of cute customers. Are you ready to create the diner of your dreams and make every animal's visit a memorable one? Join Paws & Pals Diner today!
instructions: use mouse (or tap) to interact with buttons and in game items.

title: Rush Car Driving - Race Master
description: Rush Car Driving: Race Master is a driving game that delivers thrilling action as you navigate heavy traffic. Experience the adrenaline of high-speed racing in heavy traffic, where split-second decisions can be the difference between victory and defeat. Explore a variety of immersive environments, from busy urban highways to rural roads. Choose from a wide selection of cars, from sports cars to muscle machines. Buckle up and start the race!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to move between lanes. Earn coins to buy new cars or upgrade existing ones.

title: Squid Game Memory Card Match
description: Step into the thrilling world of Squid Game Memory Card Match! Test your memory and focus as you uncover pairs of iconic Squid Game symbols and characters. Can you keep your cool under pressure and match all the cards before time runs out? Challenge yourself or compete with friends to see who can master the ultimate memory test. With Squid Game Memory Card Match, every flip brings you closer to victory or defeat – can you handle the pressure?
instructions: Mouse Click

title: Relax Mini Games Collection
description: This is a collection of creative and fun mini-games. The game contains a variety of modes, you can DIY ice cream, have cooking for mooncakes, design a car of your favorite, and so on. You cant miss our game if you want to find some relaxation in your busy life.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Sorting Balls
description: Sorting Balls is a fun and challenging puzzle game where players must sort colored balls into the correct tubes. The goal is to organize all the balls by color using logical thinking and strategic moves. As the levels progress, the puzzles become more complex, requiring careful planning. With simple controls and engaging mechanics, Sorting Balls is perfect for players who enjoy brain-teasing challenges.
instructions: 1. Tap a tube to pick up the top ball. 2. Tap another tube to place the ball if it matches the top color or if the tube is empty. 3. Continue sorting until all balls are grouped by color. 4. Plan your moves carefully—some levels require strategy! 5. Complete the level to progress to more challenging puzzles.

title: Pixel Path
description: Pixel Path is a platformer with a non—standard plot.? Get to the portal at the end of the level to win, but it's not as easy as it might seem... The floor may collapse, the spikes will move on you, and your character will grow to huge sizes. One wrong step and the game is over.❌ You will have to keep your sanity, expect surprises, show a good reaction and most importantly: do not get angry.? The game also has a table of the best players who completed all levels faster than the rest.
instructions: The goal is simple: get to the portal at the end of the level, the path to it is not as easy as it may seem... Movement - arrow buttons or W A S D. On computer: view rewarded ads when they are available - G. Exit to menu - ESC.

title: Epic Car Stunt Race Obby
description: Epic Car Stunt Race Obby is a fast-paced, acrobatic and challenging stunt racing game. In these races with hundreds of different levels, each new track creates a completely different excitement with its special design. You can play Epic Car Stunt Race Obby against AI racers or with your friend in 2 player mode. Start the endless racing excitement now!
instructions: PLAYER 1 Movement: "W,A,S;D" (Arrow keys are also active in 1 Player mode.) Nitro: "SHIFT" Respawn: "R" Camera: "C" PLAYER 2 Movement: "ARROW KEYS" Nitro: "N" Respawn: "U" Camera: "L"

title: Traffic Tap Puzzle
description: Traffic Tap Puzzle is a challenging puzzle game where players must control traffic at intersections by tapping on cars to start or stop them. The goal is to avoid collisions while ensuring a smooth flow of vehicles. As the levels progress, traffic becomes more complex, requiring strategic timing and quick decision-making. With engaging mechanics and increasing difficulty, the game tests your reflexes and planning skills.
instructions: Tap on a car to make it move or stop. Time your taps carefully to prevent crashes. Let all cars pass safely to complete the level. The difficulty increases with more cars and faster movement. Plan ahead and react quickly to manage traffic efficiently.

title: Doggo Jump
description: "Doggo Jump" is a charming hyper-casual platform game where players controls a playful puppy as it hops between platforms, collecting bones and racking up points. With simple tap-to-jump mechanics, colorful graphics, and an adorable dog character, the game is easy to pick up and addictive, making it perfect for quick gaming sessions.
instructions: Tap anywhere to make the Doggo fall faster

title: Disk Rush
description: Disk Rush is a reaction-based arcade game where players must quickly sort colored disks into their matching zones. The game challenges your speed and accuracy as disks appear faster over time. With simple tap mechanics and increasing difficulty, Disk Rush tests your ability to think and act quickly under pressure.
instructions: 1. Watch the color of the incoming disk. 2. Tap the correct side of the screen to send it to the matching zone. 3. Be quick—disks appear faster as the game progresses! 4. Sorting incorrectly ends the game, so stay focused. 5. Keep playing to beat your high score!

title: Yoga Master - Flex Running
description: Yoga Master - Flex Running is an addictive 3D running game with different levels that will challenge even the fastest reflex. Move your character to adjust the pose and dodge the incoming obstacles while picking some money on the way. But beware! Sometimes this stack of cash is a trap.
instructions: HOW TO PLAY: - Tap or swipe to begin a level. - Swipe to move the character. - Adjust the pose to dodge the furniture. - Don't let anything hit you until the end.

title: Doodle Football
description: Doodle Football is an imaginative and captivating 2D casual game that combines creativity, strategy, and fun. Your goal is simple: guide the football into the goal while overcoming exciting challenges across a variety of themes like the lush greenery of fields, the scorching sands of the desert, and the frosty landscapes of ice.
instructions: Left mouse button to draw a line. Restart button or R to restart. Start button or Space to start. [Use Landscape mode for Mobile devices]

title: Run N Shoot
description: You run and you shoot. That’s all you do, but this deceptively simple game mixes up the action and racks up the adrenalin with surprises round every corner to ensure you never get bored. Trigger finger itchy?
instructions: You’ll need to have all your wits about you and pistols at the ready to keep on running ? and keep on gunning. Enemies appear on all sides, and you have to take them down before they open fire on you to survive. Use explosives, extinguishers, and utility pipes to deal extra damage and take out multiple enemies with a single shot. Just make sure you don’t hit the innocent civilians you were sent here to save!

title: Superhero Phone Simulator
description: Explore action-packed mini-games, customize your hero, and test your skills in fun challenges. Whether you enjoy racing, creativity, or exciting adventures, this app has everything you need for endless fun!
instructions: Bottle Smash: tap or click to shoot Skateboarding Rush: buttons on screen for jump and sit Car Racing: swipe left or right to move Web Swinging: tap to shoot web, button on screen to let go of the web Fishing Frenzy: Buttons on screen for throw hook and pull the reel Wall Climber: swipe left or right to move Creative Studio: draw with the tools on the screen

title: Get a cool gun!
description: The dynamic gun runner game gives a shooting experience with the creation and evolution of weapons. Combine parts to get new weapon modules. Shoot obstacles and enemies to unlock an arsenal of powerful weapons. Test your marksmanship by shooting at targets and enemies. Improve your firepower by creating and combining weapon parts. Follow the evolution of weapons, from simple firearms to advanced weaponry. Become a true master of weapon creation!
instructions: Use your mouse to move around on PC and your finger on your phone. To upgrade weapons, you need to buy and connect parts.

title: Sprunki Puzzles and Singing
description: Before the sprunks take on their immediate duties, namely creating music, you must unlock sixteen characters. In the meantime, you have no one to create your own melodies with. To bring the Sprunki back to life, you must collect an image of each Sprunki. The picture consists of nine square fragments that are mixed on the playing field. Swap them and install them in the correct positions. Having collected all the puzzles, you can start making music in Sprunki Puzzles and Singing.
instructions: Use your mouse or tap the screen.

title: Candy Battle: Sweet Survivors
description: The city is under attack by dangerous zombies, and you must become a hero to save it! Awakened by a dream, you take on the mantle of a human warrior with unlimited potential, joining other survivors to fight against the evil horde. But with the zombies greatly outnumbering you, any mistake could lead to dire consequences. You must find a way to survive this crisis.
instructions: Just run and gun!

title: Colors&Forms
description: Dynamic and exciting! Choose the game mode! Complete missions and pass all levels! Levels differ in color palettes and falling elements. Interact with the objects appearing on the game screen, which complicate the process of the game. After accumulating enough pieces, unlock the game type “Infinity”! Choose your favorite level and accumulate as many pieces as possible to beat your opponents!
instructions: The control is simple - move the pieces at the bottom of the tracks to match the falling elements and complete the missions on each level. Before the game, choose the appropriate game mode by speed. Be careful, there may be objects on the screen that you need to interact with by clicking on them. To switch the type of game, use the button with the image of a castle. Change the language, disable music and sound effects - in the game settings.

title: Sniper 3D Zombie
description: Defend your position from the zombie invasion. You have a sniper rifle, find and eliminate zombies. Hitting a zombie is not difficult, it is much more difficult to detect it. The enemies are cunning and very well disguised, they are able to blend in with the environment. Shoot the zombies and take the first places in the leaderboard!
instructions: PC control: Mouse – camera control The left mouse button is an attack The right mouse button is aiming TAB – pause/settings Control on a mobile device: All the specified buttons and joystick are displayed on the device screen.

title: Cyberpunk Agent
description: Cyberpunk Agent is the most challenging shooting game available full of thrilling missions. Get ready to enjoy this action packed eye popping game. Your arena is attacked by scary zombies. They want to eat civilians. They are planning the dangerous missions to harm the innocents. Its time to save your people and kill all zombies. Use your best assassin skills and fight with these scary zombies.
instructions: Choose the role to move and shoot the zombies. Every round has its missions which you have to complete. You can get money and diamonds to update your role and arm. Come on and pass more levels! Desktop: Use WASD to move your player Mobile: Swipe on screen to move There are two buttons one to shoot right and the other to shoot left

title: Robby The Lava Tsunami
description: In this game, you have to get to the finish line and not get caught in the lava tsunami. The game is similar to the popular mode from roblox, but there are unique abilities waiting for you. Use them to be better than your opponents. This is a game for fans of jumping, speed, parkour. The game has many skins for your character, and you can also buy a fashionable hat.
instructions: Control (computer): ● WASD - Movement ● Mouse - Camera Overview ● Space - Jump ● Tab or Escape Pause ● Keys 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 - Activating abilities Control (phone): ● Using the game interface ● Move in any place - Camera view

title: Love Tile Trio
description: Welcome to the Valentine's Day tile matching game! Your mission is to match and clear tiles from the board. Tap a tile and move it to an empty space or a spot with a matching tile. If no matches are available or there's no room, you'll need to try again. With a countdown timer and tricky puzzles, can you beat the Love Tile challenge?
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this lovely game.

title: Crash the Robot!
description: An addictive physics puzzle game, the goal of which is to crash the robot on each level in all sorts of ways or give him the opportunity to do so himself. Arrange items from your inventory and trigger a chain of events to reach the goal! Also use cannons and jumppads. The game has over 50 levels +5 bonus levels!
instructions: Drag items from the inventory at the top of the screen onto the game scene and start the chain of events by clicking on the "Start" button at the bottom, middle of the screen. To fire the cannon, turn it to the desired angle, simultaneously select the force of the shot and release it. The shot will be fired automatically if the number of shots is indicated on the cannon. Controls: PC: mouse. 'P'/'Esc' - pause. 'R' - restart level.
